title: Core team
description: DeSports Network is completely governed through a DAO structure. Below you can meet our Core Team Members:

work_with_us.title: Join us
work_with_us.description: DeSports Network is looking for talented and driven people in the blockchain, video game, and software development industries.

readyplayerme.title: Official Partner
readyplayerme.description: Do you want a custom avatar like ours? Choose from 300+ customization options and create your own player.

dao_1.title: What is the DeSports Network DAO?
dao_1.content: DAO stands for "Decentralized Autonomous Organization". The DeSports Network DAO develop the most important smart contracts and NFTs that make up DeSports Network â€“ the competition contracts, donations and achievements. It also owns a small purse of $DESP which allows it to be truly autonomous as well as subsidize various operations and initiatives throughout DeSports Network.

dao_2.title: How does the DAO work and How is it relevant to me?
dao_2.content: It is important that users and holders be informed and also have a voice and vote in what happens in the future of the token and the project. Participate in the development of:
bullets: Listing of new games inside the platform
Size and reach of hosted competitions
